# Kalman Filter

Inline example: $\mathbf{x}_k = \mathbf{F} \mathbf{x}_{k-1} + \mathbf{w}_x$

Block example:

$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathbf{x}_k &= \mathbf{F} \mathbf{x}_{k-1} + \mathbf{w}_x \\
\mathbf{z}_k &= \mathbf{H} \mathbf{x}_k + \mathbf{w}_z
\end{aligned}
$$
